title: Why are astrophotography photos suddenly blurry?
content:
I tried taking some astrophotography photos the other night and none of them would focus.  I was using the same tripod setup I had used previously which resulted in much nicer photos.  The camera doesn't have any issues focusing in daylight or in a darkened room when using nightsight.

Here's an example of what I'm currently getting:

Compare that to what I used to get:

I tried cleaning the lens but it didn't help.  Has anyone else experienced this issue or have an idea what could be causing it?

thanks
